about_the_game:
Welcome to Hacksaw Springs! Unfortunately Part of You isn't out yet, but that doesn't mean you can't mingle with some of Hacksaw Springs strangest inhabitants. Come help setup Clown Around 20XX!

This demo is a prologue to the events of the main game with new puzzles and items for you to play around with and explore. This is an alpha version of gameplay, if you find a bug and wanna let us know, come hop into our discord and show us!

content_descriptors.notes: Though there are no direct violent acts or sexual content, there is often references to such content under the surface. This game is really not for children under 13. Discussion of smoking, black market organ clinics, and other such dark topics are referenced but never actually portrayed in game.

name: Part of You Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
